text.p: Here are the highlights from Swiss newspapers on :
Swiss food industry turnover stagnated in 1996 at 7.1 billion Swiss francs. Exports were down 0.8 percent to 1.18 billion.

A Swiss economic research group study determined that the Swiss National Bank plan to revalue gold reserves and set up a humanitarian fund would have no negative impact on either the economy or monetary policy.
International Paper Co of the U.S. plans to sell the Ilford Group in Fribourg, Switzerland as part of its recently announced restructuring plan.
